content.html: I congratulate Rishi Sunak & welcome colour not being a showstopper to becoming Prime Minister Its wonderful that any privately educated billionaire can aspire to such a position My dream is a child of state education & impoverished working class heritage will one day emulate him
content.value:
I congratulate Rishi Sunak & welcome colour not being a showstopper to becoming Prime Minister
Its wonderful that any privately educated billionaire can aspire to such a position
My dream is a child of state education & impoverished working class heritage will one day emulate him
